means: 切，切碎( carve的过去式和过去分词 )
艰苦创业，奋斗取得（事业、名声等）

sentence.Network_en: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们最终来到一扇雕刻精美的对开门前。

sentence.Network_en: One of the prisoners has carved a beautiful wooden chess set.
sentence.Network_cn: 有个犯人刻了一副漂亮的木头象棋。

sentence.Network_en: Her official number is carved on the port side of the forecabin.
sentence.Network_cn: 这艘船的注册编号刻在前舱的左舷上。

entry.def: If you carve an object, you make it by cutting it out of a substance such as wood or stone. If you carve something such as wood or stone into an object, you make the object by cutting it out.

example.ex: One of the prisoners has carved a beautiful wooden chess set...
example.tran: 有个犯人刻了一副漂亮的木头象棋。

example.ex: He carves his figures from white pine...
example.tran: 他用白松木雕刻出那些人偶。

entry.def: If you carve writing or a design on an object, you cut it into the surface of the object.

example.ex: He carved his name on his desk...
example.tran: 他把名字刻在自己的课桌上。

example.ex: The ornately carved doors were made in the seventeenth century.
example.tran: 那些雕饰精美的门制于17世纪。

entry.def: If you carve a piece of cooked meat, you cut slices from it so that you can eat it.

example.ex: Andrew began to carve the chicken...

entry.def: If you carve a career or a niche for yourself, you succeed in getting the career or the position that you want by your own efforts.

example.ex: She has carved a niche for herself as a comic actor...
example.tran: 她作为喜剧演员已经闯出了一片天地。

example.ex: They may be loyally standing by their men, but they are also carving their own careers...
example.tran: 她们也许忠诚地支持着自己的丈夫，但她们也在开创自己的事业。

entry.def: If a road is carved through a place, it is built so that it goes through that place.

example.ex: Two three-lane roads will be carved through countryside.
example.tran: 将要修建两条三车道的公路穿过乡间。

means.word_mean: 1. made for or formed by carving (`carven' is archaic or literary);

auth_sentence.content: Not Art but Nature...carved this graceful arabesque of vines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not Art but Nature...carved this graceful arabesque of vines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not Art but Nature...carved this graceful arabesque of vines.

auth_sentence.content: The two chains have carved out a loyal following.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two chains have carved out a loyal following.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two chains have carved out a loyal following.

auth_sentence.content: We have female slave names carved into the walls.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have female slave names carved into the walls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have female slave names carved into the walls.
